entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (rebel_defensive_supply_terminal.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_135: I'm looking to help out in the fighting
entries.s_137: Best of luck. The Rebellion appreciates your support. However this terminal has no combat related tasks available at this time.
entries.s_144: <In God Mode> Increase the slicing level
entries.s_145: This option will result in the terminal granting the optional item in addition to setting / increasing the bonus value on the optional item
entries.s_152: This option will reset the 'charges' value on the terminal to 0
entries.s_178: I'm looking to help in building up the local defenses.
entries.s_180: We currently have four tasks available: Barricade Construction, Reinforcement Point Construction, Tower Construction or Turret Construction .
entries.s_184: Barricade Construction is work especially suited for a Structure Trader. However any Trader will be able to help.
entries.s_190: No, I think I'll look for something else
entries.s_194: Reinforcement Point Construction is work especially suited for a Domestic Trader. However any Trader will be able to help.
entries.s_196: Yes. I'll help construct reinforcement points
entries.s_200: No, I think I'll look for something else
entries.s_204: Tower Construction is work especially suited for an Engineering Trader. However any Trader will be able to help.
entries.s_210: No, I think I'll look for something else
entries.s_214: Turret Construction is work especially suited for a Munitions Trader. However any Trader will be able to help.
entries.s_220: No, I think I'll look for something else
entries.s_224: Very well. Thank you for supporting the rebellion.
entries.s_316: Select component to scan for a level %DI security flaw.
entries.s_320: You have located an exploitable security flaw in level %DI's Data Pipeline
entries.s_322: Proceed to the next security level
entries.s_324: You found no security flaws in the level %DI's Data Pipeline. Returning to level 1.
entries.s_330: You have located an exploitable security flaw in level %DI's Instruction Handler
entries.s_332: Proceed to the next security level
entries.s_334: You found no security flaws in the level %DI's Instruction Handler. Returning to level 1.
entries.s_340: You have located an exploitable security flaw in level %DI's Operations Core
entries.s_342: Proceed to the next security level
entries.s_344: You found no security flaws in the level %DI's Operations Core. Returning to level 1.
entries.s_348: Disconnect and start slicing the terminal.
entries.s_352: You have successfully scanned all ten security levels. You now have to disconnect from the terminal and slice the components.
entries.s_354: Disconnect and start slicing the terminal.
entries.s_358: The security has been reset. Please disconnect from this terminal.
entries.s_37: Accessing defensive supply terminal. Please note that access to this terminal is restricted to rebel personal only.
entries.s_39: Your identity has been associated with a known Imperial supporter. Please discontinue any use of this terminal.
entries.s_40: You have been recognized as a rebel operative. Please select the type of activity you are interested in.
entries.s_72: Please give me some material enhancers.
entries.s_74: Material enhancers can only be dispenced once every 60 seconds. Please return later.
entries.s_99: Your identity has not been registered as an active Rebel Operative. Please log off this terminal.
